publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: I feel so good, i feel so amazing,
Just get in the mood; i think we can make it
Just give me your hands we fly away
Just give the night and I will stay
It feels so good it feel so amazing
We will dance and have some fun well have some fun
Oh oh oh oh oh oh...
I feel so good I feel so amazing
I feel so right tonight and everyone's happy
I'm having the best time of my life
Having the best time of my life it feels so good it feel so amazing
